pages.text: $(pncr) currently has two $(thing)tiers/$ for pneumatic machines:$(p)$(li)$(thing)Tier one/$ machines are capable of nominally resisting 5 bar of pressure.$(li)$(thing)Tier two/$ machines can resist up to 20 bar.
Note that $(thing)bar/$ as used by $(pncr) represents the pressure $(bold)above/$ normal atmospheric pressure, so 0 bar is unpressurized air, and -1 bar is a vacuum.
